page.title: 07THE ASHFIELD HOTEL.
page.content:
THE ASHFIELD HOTEL IS SITUATED BETWEEN OSWESTRY AND THE VILLAGE OF TREFONEN IN THE BEAUTIFUL CANDY VALLEY. IT IS IN AN IDEAL POSITION FOR TOURING NORTH WALES, MID WALES AND THE WELSH MARCHES. THE HOTEL CATERS FOR PEOPLE FROM ALL WALKS OF LIFE AND NATIONALITIES. DURING 1985 GUESTS CAME FROM AS FAR AWAY AS AUSTRALIA, CANADA, JAPAN AND SWEDEN. IN THE OFF SEASON SCHOOL PARTIES ARE ACCOMODATED - ACTIVITIES INCLUDE HORSE RIDING, CANOEING AND EDUCATIONAL OUTINGS TO PLACES SUCH AS IRON BRIDGE AND CHESTER ZOO.
THERE ARE FOURTEEN BEDROOMS WITH COUNTRYSIDE VIEWS, A LARGE DINING ROOM TWO LOUNGES AND A BAR.
